resources.string: Cloud storage simplifies and fastens \'save\' and \'retrieve\' data processes. Multi-users support and real time updates are among the many advantages of using this App!
No technical skills are required to use this app. Everything has been made simple for you!
Data safety is our first priority when it comes to user experience. For this reason we\'ve ensured that only authorized people can access the database. \n\n Enjoy the App!
